name: Grip
description: Grip training exercises to improve hand strength and endurance.

workout_groups.name: Beginner Grip Endurance Routine
workout_groups.description: Basic grip-strengthening exercises to build endurance and foundational hand strength.

workouts.name: Dead Hang
workouts.description: Hang from a pull-up bar with a relaxed grip to build endurance.

workouts.name: Wrist Curls
workouts.description: Use light dumbbells to strengthen the wrist flexors.

workouts.name: Finger Extensions
workouts.description: Use a rubber band around your fingers and extend outward to strengthen extensor muscles.

workouts.name: Plate Pinch Hold
workouts.description: Pinch a light weight plate with your fingers to develop grip endurance.

workouts.name: Towel Grip Hold
workouts.description: Wrap a towel around a pull-up bar and hang from it to improve finger strength.

workout_groups.name: Crushing Grip Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: Intermediate grip exercises focusing on crushing strength, necessary for heavy lifting and sports performance.

workouts.name: Heavy Dead Hangs
workouts.description: Hold onto a bar with added weight using a weighted vest or belt.

workouts.name: Gripper Crush Holds
workouts.description: Use a hand gripper to strengthen your crushing grip.

workouts.name: Farmerâ€™s Walk
workouts.description: Carry heavy dumbbells or kettlebells while walking to engage forearm and grip strength.

workouts.name: Thick Bar Holds
workouts.description: Hold onto a thick barbell or use thick grips to challenge forearm muscles.

workouts.name: Pull-Up Bar Hang with Towel Grip
workouts.description: Wrap a towel around a pull-up bar and grip it tightly while hanging.

workout_groups.name: Pinch Grip Power Routine
workout_groups.description: A specialized grip workout focused on pinching strength, useful for lifting, climbing, and combat sports.

workouts.name: Plate Pinch Deadlifts
workouts.description: Lift a pair of plates pinched together to increase pinch grip power.

workouts.name: Block Weight Lifts
workouts.description: Grip and lift a block-shaped object like a brick or a thick piece of metal.

workouts.name: Pinch Grip Holds
workouts.description: Hold onto a weighted plate using only finger strength.

workouts.name: Thumb Pinch Presses
workouts.description: Pinch a heavy object between the thumb and fingers and press it upward.

workouts.name: One-Handed Plate Pinch Lift
workouts.description: Lift a heavy plate with one hand using only your fingertips.

workout_groups.name: Wrist & Forearm Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: A grip workout designed to improve wrist stability and forearm endurance for lifting and combat sports.

workouts.name: Reverse Wrist Curls
workouts.description: Curl a barbell or dumbbell with your palms facing downward.

workouts.name: Hammer Curls
workouts.description: Perform curls with a neutral grip to target the forearm flexors.

workouts.name: Rice Bucket Finger Curls
workouts.description: Dig fingers into a bucket of rice and curl them for resistance.

workouts.name: Wrist Roller
workouts.description: Roll up and down a weight using a wrist roller tool.

workouts.name: Barbell Finger Rolls
workouts.description: Let a barbell roll to your fingertips and curl it back up.

workout_groups.name: Super Grip Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: Elite grip training for maximum hand and forearm strength, suited for athletes and strength competitors.

workouts.name: Rolling Thunder Deadlifts
workouts.description: Use a thick rotating handle to perform deadlifts and test crushing grip power.

workouts.name: One-Finger Dead Hangs
workouts.description: Hang from a bar using only one finger per hand.
